name: places/ChIJUSqo9QtZwokRyaV_MAhnNzg
formattedAddress: 1003 2nd Ave 3rd Floor, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1003 2nd Ave 3rd Floor, New York, NY 10022-4864, USA

originalText.text:
I had an amazing experience at the Purefix MedSpa office with Dr Michael Abboud (AKA Dr Papa). He is very laid-back and friendly. From the moment that I met Dr. Papa, he felt like family. He is a person that truly cares about each patient and is honest. He will help you to achieve your best results possible. As they say, “ beauty is in the eye of the beholder”. He truly understands the value of self imagine and that how you feel about yourself is key.

Dr. Abboud has been in the industry for many years and it shows. My personal experience at the MedSpa office helped change my mind about enhancing my looks.  After having a bad experience in the past,I wanted to make sure that I felt the doctor was knowledgeable and educated on each product. I was looking for someone to make a “ plan “ for me and help me achieve the look that I wanted. As soon as I sat down with him, he knew exactly what I needed. Opposed to Doctors that just want to inject for a “ Quick fix” with a hefty price tag, he took the time so make sure I was comfortable and was aware of all of my options.
I decided to go with micro needling under the eye . I wanted to correct wrinkles in order to create a youthful appearance -opposed to using filler.  Which in the past was a total nightmare for me! I had a great result and I will definitely be back for more treatments.  Also, We did one syringe for my lips. They look amazing and I haven’t been happier with the outcome. This Dr. truly knows how to place his Botox. I can’t say enough positive things. Just a complete thumbs up. If you want a doctor that truly cares, make an appointment to see Dr Papa. You won’t be disappointed! I will be sending my friends over. Thank you so much for making me feel my best!
